definition: (question particle for "yes-no" questions)
see 嗎啡|吗啡, morphine
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
see 幹嘛|干嘛[gan4 ma2]
morphine (loanword)
isn't that so?
manna (Israelite food)
morpholine (chemistry) (loanword)

sentences.english: Would my take you hand, would you understand Just how I feel?
sentences.chinese: 我能牵起你的手感受我的内心吗？

sentences.english: Does she always dress that badly?
sentences.chinese: 她总是穿得那么邋遢的吗？

sentences.english: What sequela is there after becoming gall-stone operation?
sentences.chinese: 做了胆结石手术后有什么后遗症吗？

sentences.english: Can web vulnerability scanners help you remediate the vulnerability?
sentences.chinese: Web漏洞扫描器能帮助我们修补漏洞吗？

sentences.english: Mr. Black, I have just been married, therefore can I get a raise in my wages?
sentences.chinese: 布莱克先生，我刚刚结婚了，所以我能提薪吗？

sentences.english: Can you pick up London on the radio?
sentences.chinese: 你的收音机能收听到伦敦的电台吗？

sentences.english: Have you ever known there are such creatures as an albino two-headed snake?
sentences.chinese: 你知道这个世界上有一种叫做双头白化蛇的生物吗？

sentences.english: Is the production line fully auto?
Can you please open an irrevocable documentary credit?
sentences.chinese: 能开一张不可撤消的跟单信用证吗？

sentences.english: Yes, it was about the car auxiliary power plants, am I right?
sentences.chinese: 当然，那是关于轿车辅助动力设备，是吗？

sentences.english: And if war comes do such men as these shoulder the musket and go into the trenches?
sentences.chinese: 但一旦战争来临，这类人会肩扛步枪进入战壕吗？

sentences.english: Will insulin analogs improve my diabetes treatment plan?
sentences.chinese: 胰岛素类似物会改善我的糖尿病治疗计划吗？

sentences.english: Should I go up to the rooftop?
Have Chesapeake and other natural-gas producers survived the worst of the crisis?
sentences.chinese: 切萨皮克以及其他的天然气公司真的挺过来了吗？

sentences.english: Are you willing to return, escorted by me?
sentences.chinese: 你愿意回去吗，由我来护送？

definition: youngest/most junior/tiny/one (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers, esp. on telephone or in military)/one or ace on dice or dominoes/variant of 吆[yao1], to shout
surname Yao
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
woolen material

particle indicating that a previously asked question is to be applied to the preceding word ("What about ...?", "And ...?")/particle for inquiring about location ("Where is ...?")/particle signaling a pause, to emphasize the preceding words and allow the listener time to take them on board ("ok?", "are you with me?")/(at the end of a declarative sentence) particle indicating continuation of a state or action/particle indicating strong affirmation
is or isn't/yes or no/whether or not
why?/for what reason?
how?/how about?/how was it?/how are things?
yes, that's right/variant of 似的[shi4 de5]
(before a noun) Do (you, they etc) have ...?/Is there a ...?/(before a verb) Did (you, they etc) (verb, infinitive)?/Have (you, they etc) (verb, past participle)?
you (plural)
interjection or grunt of agreement/uhm/Ah, OK/expression of recognition/Oh, it's you!
modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent
interjection of surprise/Ah!/Oh!
interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer/Eh?/what?
interjection of surprise or doubt/Eh?/My!/what's up?
modal particle indicating that sth is obvious/particle indicating a pause for emphasis
(particle equivalent to 啊 after a vowel, expressing surprise or doubt)
how?/what?/why?
variant of 怎麼|怎么[zen3 me5]
like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
dialectal equivalent of 為什麼|为什么[wei4 shen2 me5]
you (informal, as opposed to courteous 您[nin2])
